text:
This is feedback for the security agency. Not sure how it is for the residents. But definitely not a good experience for visitors.

The guard post is fully Aircon which can be justified as it is hot in Singapore. Unfortunately some of the security officers are just really lazy. They will take at least 5 to 10 seconds to respond to any visitor at the window because they are engrossed in their phone or dozing/stoning.

If you are a repeat visitor and you pass your nric, they will almost always appear stunned or a bit annoyed at being disturbed.then you have to repeat your visit at least 3 times.

I really don't know how security officers of such quality can help ensure safety in the condo if there were to be any form of danger. The level of alertness is so low..

One such officer is Miguel. No one is manning the window. He was in a bit of daze seated at least 5m away. When called by the lady manning the barrier, he then moved to the window. His tone of voice can also be improved.

Almost all the officers here behave in similar fashion for my four visits so far. The only exception is the lady manning the barrier. She is alert and friendly. She should be an example to the rest.

Double Bay Residences is a 99 yrs leasehold property residing in Simei district. Packed with wide range of condo facilities including some novelty ones like library, golf practice room, karaoke rooms, jam room, mahjong room...
Nice place but security damn stupid cannot open the gate for delivery personnel
Really a resort living lifestyle, you can use tranquility during night fall. You will be amaze by the design of the project. Share the angle view of the project.
The indian grocery shop facing the road keeps making weird noise during the day. If not always got people gather outside the shop and talk loud. Affecting the residents staying opposite.
